com.oracle.sfp.scripting.api

Interface ICoaAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IScriptingObject

    public interface ICoaAPI
extends IScriptingObject
    A student's cost of attendance (COA).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getActiveCoa()
      Gets the active cost of attendance.
      int getActualCoa()
      Gets the actual cost of attendance.
      ICoaComponentsAPI getComponents()
      Gets the COA components.
      int getPellCoa()
      Gets the PELL cost of attendance.
      int getTotalCoa()
      Gets the total cost of attendance.
      ICoaAPI in(IAcademicTermPeriodAPI term)
      Filters by term.
      ICoaAPI in(IAcademicYearScheduleAPI academicYear)
      Filters by academic year.
      ICoaAPI inAcademicYear(int academicYearNumber)
      Filters by academic year.
      ICoaAPI inTerm(int termNumber)
      Filters by term.

    • Method Detail

      • inAcademicYear

        @Nonnull
ICoaAPI inAcademicYear(int academicYearNumber)
        Filters by academic year.
        Parameters:
        academicYearNumber - the academic year number
        Returns:
        new COA containing only the part matching the given academic year

      • inTerm

        @Nonnull
ICoaAPI inTerm(int termNumber)
        Filters by term.
        Parameters:
        termNumber - the term number
        Returns:
        new COA containing only the part matching the given academic year

      • in

        @Nonnull
ICoaAPI in(@Nonnull
                    IAcademicYearScheduleAPI academicYear)
        Filters by academic year.
        Parameters:
        academicYear - the academic year
        Returns:
        new COA containing only the part matching the given academic year

      • in

        @Nonnull
ICoaAPI in(@Nonnull
                    IAcademicTermPeriodAPI term)
        Filters by term. Notice that this method precludes filtering by academic year as the term object already contains the academic year number.
        Parameters:
        term - the term
        Returns:
        new COA containing only the part matching the given term

        int getActiveCoa()
        Gets the active cost of attendance.
        Returns:
        active COA

      • getPellCoa

        int getPellCoa()
        Gets the PELL cost of attendance.
        Returns:
        PELL COA

      • getComponents

        @Nonnull
ICoaComponentsAPI getComponents()
        Gets the COA components.
        Returns:
        COA components
